title.@value: Motorcycle as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event

definition.@value: A motorcycle is a land transport motor vehicle with one or two riding saddles, usually with two-wheels in-line. A sidecar or trailer is considered part of the motorcycle.

label.@value: Includes vehicles with one wheel at the rear and two closely-spaced steerable wheels at the front and motorised tricycles (one wheel at the front) if registered as motor-cycles
Motorcycle as mode of transport of person injured in transport related event
Includes vehicles with one wheel at the rear and two closely-spaced steerable wheels at the front and motorised tricycles (one wheel at the front) if registered as motor-cycles
